It also mentions that doctors may perform a medical history, exam, and tests to diagnose the issue. If an illness is responsible for the enuresis, it will be treated. If no medical problem is found, behavioral approaches can be used for treatment, such as managing what you eat and drink before bed, using positive imagery, using bedwetting alarms, and sometimes using medicines. The video states that bedwetting can go away on its own, but it may take many weeks for the body to unlearn the habit.
